story: Fictional retail bank needed executive visibility into cross-border customer spend for AML risk monitoring and annual limit breach detection. Built dimensional model with star schema grain at customer-transaction level enabling both detailed analysis and executive rollups.
outcome: Power BI solution with defensible KPI design correct evaluation context and full auditability. Demonstrated best-practice dimensional modeling and advanced DAX for financial services reporting patterns.

story: Conducted risk-based internal audit across IT general controls for financial reporting. Identified control gaps in change management access controls and segregation of duties. Designed remediation roadmap prioritized by risk severity and implementation feasibility.
outcome: Executive report with clear risk ratings actionable recommendations and realistic timelines. All findings supported by test evidence. Management accepted all recommendations and committed to remediation timeline.

story: Organization needed analytics capability that balanced self-service with governance. Designed platform architecture with automated data quality checks role-based access and audit trails while enabling rapid iteration for analysts.
outcome: Architecture approved by both technical and compliance stakeholders. Proof of concept demonstrated feasibility. Platform design became template for other data initiatives.

story: New data protection regulation required assessment of current state gaps and remediation approach across business data application and infrastructure domains. Conducted impact analysis across enterprise architecture planes.
outcome: Comprehensive gap analysis with costed remediation options. Executive decision pack with clear trade-offs between compliance speed and business disruption. Phased implementation plan approved.

story: Built time series model to detect unusual patterns in customer transaction behavior for early warning of potential limit breaches or fraudulent activity. Needed to separate seasonal patterns from genuine anomalies.
outcome: Model correctly identified 87% of limit breaches 2 weeks before they occurred with false positive rate under 5%. Enabled proactive customer communication and prevented regulatory breaches.

story: Board requested single-view dashboard showing enterprise risk posture across operational financial compliance and strategic risks. Required synthesis from multiple source systems with different data quality and timeliness.
outcome: Dashboard deployed with automated refresh and data quality indicators. Board using it monthly for risk oversight. First time board has had real-time view of enterprise risk exposure.

story: Analytics outputs losing credibility due to inconsistent data quality. Designed and implemented data quality framework with automated checks profiling and issue tracking integrated into dbt workflows.
outcome: Data quality issues reduced by 65% in first quarter. Analytics team credibility restored. Framework adopted as standard for all new data pipelines.

story: Major initiative stalled due to misalignment between business IT and compliance on requirements and priorities. Designed and facilitated workshop series to build shared understanding and aligned roadmap.
outcome: All stakeholders agreed on prioritized requirements and phased delivery approach. Initiative unstuck and progressing. Stakeholders requested similar approach for future initiatives.
